title: Applying Patches.....
body:
A fresh install of league of legends and the patches is not installing properly.

Region N.A Legit just to update the client the patches are taking 3 hours........

Something is wrong with the servers.

Cant download until they are fixed.

replies.body: Just to clarify, are you unable to download the patch itself, or when you try to it takes a lot of time? :0 From what I can see at the time, we weren't experiencing any server problems. If you're still having issues on that patch, a good idea is to hit up our Patching guide [**right over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) for steps to try. But if you give me some more details (error messages are really helpful to finding the cause) I might be able to help with finding the cause as well. :)
I just wanted to let you know that you have an awesome username xD
Hahaha! xD I'm pretty fond of it myself. What's not to love about trash-pandas? http://bit.ly/2tCgc1G
